content: {"name": "Brookland Manor RIA Community Center", "alternate_name": "", "description": "For seniors 55+, and you must register with the Capital Area Food Bank to receive food. You can fill out an application at the community center, and they will help you send it. The food distribution on the third Saturday does not require you to register in advance.", "email": "", "url": null, "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "2525 14th Street Northeast", "address_2": null, "city": "Northeast Washington", "state_province": "DC", "postal_code": "20018", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 38.9235829, "longitude": -76.98579409999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(202) 529-6529", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "18:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "18:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Adult diapers available"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Must bring own bags/cart"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Seniors Only"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clothing may be available"}]}
